body.name: Anycool Wireless Mouse,2.4GHz with USB Mini Receiver,Mouse,Computer Mouse for Laptop/PC/Computer/Notebook,800-1600 DPI Optical Tracking,Slim Rechargeable Silent Mouse (White)

features: 【Silent Clicks】Designed with silent click technology, this mouse allows you work in peace without disturbing people around you. You can focus on your tasks without any distractions, making it perfect for shared work environments.
【Compact & Lightweight】Sleek, slim, and lightweight – our mouse is designed to fit your on-the-go lifestyle. Simply slip it into your laptop bag or pocket, and you're ready to work on the move.
【Plug & Play】Our Wireless Mouse provides a hassle-free setup, allowing you to connect to your device without the constraints of cords and cables. No complicated installations or drivers required.

【Long-lasting Battery】Our Wireless Mouse is equipped with a long-lasting battery that ensures uninterrupted usage for extended periods. You can rely on this mouse to keep up with your demands without frequent re-charging.
【Universal Compatibility】Our Wireless Mouse is compatible with a wide range of devices. It bridges the gap between various devices, ensuring you a smooth and uninterrupted user experience.

【Extended Receiving Range】The extended receiving range of our Wireless Mouse allows you to easily control your device from a distance. Whether you're giving a presentation or simply prefer a bit of flexibility, our mouse has you covered.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ANYCOOL WIRELESS MOUSE We've meticulously crafted this mouse with the latest technology, redefining your digital experience. With improved responsiveness, connectivity, and a sleek ergonomic design, it's engineered to meet the demands of the modern user. Some of our advanced festures includes, Silent ClicksCompact & LightweightPlug & PlayLong-lasting BatteryUniversal CompatibilityExtended Receiving Range Embrace endless potential and elevate your digital experience to unprecedented levels. Make the leap today and unlock the essence of state-of-the-art innovation.

Our 3-Stage DPI Wireless Mouse is your ultimate tool for precise and customizable control. With three adjustable DPI (dots per inch) stages, this mouse allows you to fine-tune your cursor sensitivity to match your preferences and tasks. This mouse adapts to your needs seamlessly whetehr you need swift movements for, Precise clicks for design work/ image processingRegular work/study usage for everyday tasksGaming Experience unparalleled accuracy and responsiveness, empowering you to navigate your digital world.

Experience the innovative hush of silent clicks. Imagine the freedom to work in libraries, crowded coffee shops, or shared workspaces without disturbing anyone around you. With our Silent Click function, every press is virtually noiseless, providing you with the same satisfying tactile feedback without the usual click sound. This technology not only enhances your focus but also ensures a more harmonious environment for those nearby. Whether you're a student studying late at night, a professional working in a bustling office, or a creative individual in need of a quiet workspace, our Silent Click Wireless Mouse offers the perfect solution. With this advanced technology, redefining the way you interact with your digital world – silently, efficiently, and seamlessly.

Indulge in elegance with our sleek and stylish Wireless Mouse, meticulously crafted for the discerning user. Its ergonomic design caters to both left and right-handed users, ensuring a comfortable grip and effortless control for everyone.
Product Specification Size (L×W×H) 4.33Inch × 2.24Inch × 0.83Incch DPI 800/1200/1600 Receiving Range Up to 33 Feet Inside the Package Mouse, USB Charging Cables, Nano Receiver, English Instruction

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple no sleek.
reviews.reviewText: We have been using this mouse for a little over a month now with no big complaints. For me, I like the sleek design with no fuss. I do however would like better gripping on the side. With it being so smooth I have had it flip in my hand when I would grab it a bit aggressively. It does feel a bit too light weight but that could be just me being used to our old big, chunky, corded mouse. It has held up well for now but does feel like it could easily break if dropped. But again that could be me being use to our old chunky, heavy mouse. My son loves it because it is wireless and doesn’t tangle with his collectibles that he likes to display near the computer. Comes with a usb cord that we use to charge it over night. One charge lasts about a few days but we don’t use the computer constantly. Came packaged neatly and quick with no real set up other than charging it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not bad at all
reviews.reviewText: "I was not expecting a lot, however it went well.All works as described. Battery life is about 4-5 days, depending on use.Looks fancy on the table.. Never was into those lights, but after use decided to leave it - it is fun.Seems to be well built, no clamsy plastic feel.Good purchase."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No Problems, Works Good
reviews.reviewText: I have only been using this wireless mouse for about a week and so far, I am satisfied. I am using it for my laptop, and it was easy to set up and is very quiet. I like the feel of the mouse and it's pretty lightweight making it easy to move around. I have not had any issues with the charge of the mouse. I charged it per instructions prior to the first use and then usually overnight. I have been using it every day this week for work, approximately six hours, and it works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best wireless mouse I have used in a while
reviews.reviewText: Super smooth and silent mouse with battery that lasts for what seems like forever!Seller also extremely helpful and sorted out issue I had with lost USB receiver.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable mouse
reviews.reviewText: I love the soft feel of the mouse. It is sensitive and moves easily. Much nicer than my old Microsoft mouse

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good mouse
reviews.reviewText: I used this mouse more than a week. Very handy and decent mouse. It has two connection ways. One is wireless and second is by Bluetooth used both very effective and no lag. It’s battery timing is also very very good. I fully charged it one and in 9 to 10 days I didn’t charge it.
